attributes.action: Reform the House of Lords as a democratically elected Parliament.
attributes.background:
The House of Lords is an out of date and undemocratic system - 670 out of 783 of members are life peers. Huge reform to the system is necessary.
A 2012 YouGov poll commissioned by Unlock Democracy found 69% of voters support a reformed House of Lords. 
http://www.unlockdemocracy.org/lords-reform/

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104682

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
